name: Persephone, the Nether Empress
text:
Stealth Your J/ruler is "Rezzard, the Undead Lord" or "Rezzard, the Desecrating Vampire" and you have more than ten or more cards in your graveyard. (While this card is in your chant-standby area, you may play it without pay ing its cost when its Stealth condition is met.)
<div class="fdb-separator-v-05">
set: The Seven Kings of the Lands
